name: Ws-project
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This is our formal API for Node.js service that was bulid with express module for a school project. 

### Looks
####Get All Looks
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/getAllLooks`  
Result: All looks, including their steps  
Method: GET  
Example:   
```
{
  look: "fresh",
  image: "http://res.cloudinary.com/desbjknxm/image/upload/v1468704051/rsz_3fresh_eovzbd.jpg",
  __v: 13,
  steps: [
  {
    number: 1,
    face_image: "http://res.cloudinary.com/desbjknxm/image/upload/v1468700970/htijb01e02otjh6ozf24.jpg",
    description: "description",
    product_id: 4
  }]
}
```
####Get Look
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/getLook/:look`  
Result: Specific Look.  
Method: GET  
Example: Like above.  

####Add Look
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/addLook`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: POST  
Params: look, url.  

####Add Look
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/updateLook`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: POST  
Params: look, url.  

####Remove Look
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/removeLook/:look`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: GET  
Params: look.  

####Add Step To Look
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/addStepToLook`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: POST  
Params: look, number, url, desc, prodId.  
Explain: look- look's name, number - step number, url -image, desc - description, prodId- product id.  

####Remove Step From Look
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/removeStepFromLook/:look/:number`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: GET  
Params: look-name of look, number- step number.  

####Remove Step From Look
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/getLookSteps/:look`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: GET  

###CATEGORIES
####Get All Categories  
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/getAllCategories`  
Result: JSON all categories that was saved in DB.  
Method: GET  
Example:  
```
[{
  _id: "578938251d4e340300fd3e81",
  id: 1,
  name: "eyes",
  image: "https:/res.cloudinary.com/desbjknxm/image/upload/v1468610599/piecsqzxmknbnzbinxed.jpg",
  __v: 0
}]
```
####Get Category
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/getCategory/:category`  
Result: JSON specific category, like shown above.  
Method: GET  

####Remove Category
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/removeCategory/:category`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: GET.  

####Add Category
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/addCategory/:id/:name`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: GET.  

####Update Category
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/updateCategory/:id/:name`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: GET.  

####Update Category
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/uploadCategoryImage`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: POST.  
Params: category - category name, url - url to image.  

###PRODUCTS
####Get All products
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/getAllProducts`   
Result: JSON with all products that was saved in DB.   
Method: GET   
Example:  
```
[
{
  _id: "5789305c1d4e340300fd3e7b",
  id: 1,
  name: "shadow",
  price: "75.00 ₪",
  image: "http://res.cloudinary.com/desbjknxm/image/upload/v1468609553/shadow-20-small-new_ef1kou.jpg",
  big_image: "http://res.cloudinary.com/desbjknxm/image/upload/v1468609620/shadow-20-a-new_p5rigt.jpg",
  short_desc: "shadow desc",
  description: "description about this product",
  category: "eyes",
  __v: 0
}
]
```
####Get Product 
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/getProduct/:id`   
Result: JSON specific product, like shown above.   
Method: GET   

####Remove Product
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/removeProduct/:id`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: GET.  

####Add Product
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/addProduct/:id/:name/:price/:sdesc/:desc/:category`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: GET.  
Params: sdesc- short description, desc - full description.  

####Update Product
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/updateProduct/:id/:name/:price/:sdesc/:desc/:category`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: GET.  

####Get Category Products
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/getCategoryProducts/:category`   
Result: JSON with products from specific category.   
Method: GET  

####Get Wish List
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/getWishList/:username`   
Result: JSON with products of specific user.   
Method: GET  

####Add To Wish List
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/addToWishList/:username/:prodId`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: GET. 

####Remove From Wish List
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/removeFromWishList/:username/:prodId`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: GET. 

####upload Product Image
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/uploadProdImage`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: POST.
Params: id - product id, image - image, bimage - big image.

###USER
####Get All Users
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/getUsers`  
Result: JSON with all users that was saved in DB.  
Method: GET  
Example:  
```
[
  _id: "578a0ad1fa8650030052eedb",
  username: "tryt5475@gmail.com",
  admin: false,
  __v: 0,
  wish_list: [ ]
]
```
####Get User
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/getUser/:username`  
Result: JSON specific user, like shown above.  
Method: GET  

####Remove User
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/removeUser/:username`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: GET.  

####Add User
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/addUser/:username/:admin`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: GET.  
Params: username- email, admin- boolean.  

####Update User
URL: `https://webserviceproj.herokuapp.com/api/updateUser/:username/:admin`  
Result: JSON with message - success/error.  
Method: GET.


### Authors and Contributors
In 2016, Avital Glazer (@avitalg)and Zohar Tzfania created this app.

### Support or Contact
